titleInfo.title: W.L. Clement oral history. Audio. Part 1.
Photographs of W.L. Clement, U.S. Soil Conservation Service

location.physicalLocation: Digital Initiatives, James E. Walker Library, Middle Tennessee State University

mods.accessCondition: Copyright Arts Center of Cannon County May be excerpted for educational and non-commercial use with attribution

relatedItem.abstract: This collection includes photographs of agricultural activities in Cannon County, TN that were taken by W.L. Clement, District Conservationist for the U.S. Soil Conservation Service, and his assistants between the mid-1940s and mid-1970s. They document the daily work of the farm families in Cannon County and the agricultural techniques promoted by the U.S. Department of Agriculture during the period.

mods.note: Digital Initiatives, James E. Walker Library, Middle Tennessee State University
